mapper.select: SELECT 会員番号 as "memberNumber.value", 氏名 as "name.value", 会員種別 as "memberType" FROM 会員.会員 WHERE 会員番号 = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 会員._貸出と会員(会員番号, 貸出番号) VALUES (#{memberNumber.value}, #{loanNumber.value})
mapper.select: SELECT 貸出.貸出番号 as "loanNumber.value", 貸出.所蔵品番号 as "itemNumber.value", _貸出と会員.会員番号 as "memberNumber.value", 貸出.貸出日 as "loanDate.value" FROM 貸出.貸出 INNER JOIN 会員._貸出と会員 ON 貸出.貸出番号 = _貸出と会員.貸出番号 WHERE _貸出と会員.会員番号 = #{memberNumber.value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM 会員._貸出と会員 WHERE 貸出番号 = #{loanNumber.value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 会員._予約と会員(会員番号, 予約番号) VALUES (#{memberNumber.value}, #{reservationNumber.value})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM 会員._予約と会員 WHERE 予約番号 = #{reservationNumber.value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 会員._取置と会員(会員番号, 取置番号) VALUES (#{memberNumber.value}, #{retentionNumber.value})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM 会員._取置と会員 WHERE 取置番号 = #{retentionNumber.value}
